description:
Majhong Games:Deluxe Brain Training Memory Game is a free mahjongg matching game. This premium quality game is your perfect match for playing some relaxing Majong.

Majhong Games:Deluxe Brain Training Memory Game is one of the most popular board games in the world. The simple rules and relaxing game play means that anyone can enjoy a round of Mahjong Titan.

This free board game is also known as Mah Jong, Majong and Top Mahjong. In Mahjongg Games:Deluxe Brain Training Memory Game you match pairs of identical Mahjongg tiles.

Start playing the best Mahjong Solitaire available on the store right now! Just install and tap on it! You will have fun like never before. This game was developed with help of professional Mahjong players. Crispy clear, perfect sized tiles, incredible boards and super easy to play interface will get you hooked right away!

The rules are as simple as they can: Just tap on two identical tiles to remove them from the board. Both tiles must be free to be tapped. The goal is to clear the board.

You can play it for relaxing or challenging yourself. The game was conceived for beginners, average or advanced users.


Features:

• Over 1200 boards!
• A new Mahjong board a day!
• 7 large, high quality tile sets.
• 8 backgrounds.
• Optimized for portrait mode.
• Fun goals to master.
• 1080p HD Graphics.
• Hundreds and hundreds of boards
• Incomparable gameplay
• Undo option
• Hints option
• Shuffle the board if necessary
• Original images and some exclusive tiles
• Autosave game upon exit or interruptions
• Retina device optimised
• and much more!

Mahjong is also called Mah-Jong, Mahjongg Trails, Taipei Mahjong, Chinese Mahjong and five stars Mahjong.
